issues.title: Undo rejects rather than restores to suggested
issues.description: The Undo button calls handleReject() which sets status to rejected. Users may expect Undo to restore item to suggested state.
issues.recommendation: Add DELETE endpoint to remove decision and restore to suggested, or rename button to Remove

issues.title: Silent error handling on action failures
issues.description: Accept/reject action failures are logged but not displayed to user. User gets no feedback when action fails.
issues.recommendation: Consider adding toast notification or inline error state for action failures

issues.title: Similarity score not captured on decision
issues.description: The _record_evidence_decision function accepts similarity_score but endpoints don't pass it. Loses analytics capability.
issues.recommendation: Consider passing similarity score from frontend or looking it up server-side

issues.title: No user tracking for decisions
issues.description: Table has decided_at but no decided_by field. State changes cannot be attributed to users.
issues.recommendation: Consider adding decided_by in future iteration for multi-user scenarios

positives.title: Test coverage is comprehensive
positives.description: 16 backend tests + 3 filtering tests + 21 frontend tests. All pass. Contract tests verify response structure.

summary: Well-implemented feature. Backend properly validates inputs, handles state transitions with UPSERT semantics, and filters rejected items from GET responses. Frontend handles all states correctly with good test coverage. Issues are minor UX considerations for future iteration.
